Articles.Content: I am making a world where nothing is as it seems, if you would like a free copy of it, comment your ideas, and i will put a download link. Thank You.
A little more information would be welcome.
Stating that you have something awesome is not a great way to get a lot of interest, proof or at least a description is required.
Not interested, as I have no clue what to be interested in.

is it a fanfic where Jeb and Bill are in an accident involving a new propulsion technology and find themselves transformed and transported to be pokemon who get captured by a little black girl and forced to eat cupcakes and headbutt yarn as well as periodically defeating inferior pokemon, waiting with faded hope for the day they will be left out of their balls and unwatched so they may begin the space program anew and maybe find a way home?

I am making a world where nothing is as it seems

hmm lets see then what he may be talking about...

ok i can draw only two conclusion which is that he is either retexturing everything in KSP or he is making a new planet that may feature something that will either be very weird or really cool then again after looking at his other threads i can't make that conclusion

is it a fanfic where Jeb and Bill are in an accident involving a new propulsion technology and find themselves transformed and transported to be pokemon who get captured by a little black girl and forced to eat cupcakes and headbutt yarn as well as periodically defeating inferior pokemon, waiting with faded hope for the day they will be left out of their balls and unwatched so they may begin the space program anew and maybe find a way home?

This is pure genius.

I am making a world where nothing is as it seems, if you would like a free copy of it, comment your ideas, and i will put a download link. Thank You.

Good thing that you aren't allowed to sell it

Good thing that you aren't allowed to sell it

Not on this website, though I am sure that Squad's legal powers are limited when it comes to things being sold for KSP - but not containing any of their work.

I don't think anything could be more exciting than eggrobin's Principia, right now. Except random changes in gravitational strength, which I doubt this would do.

More specific details would be helpful, as hype running on vague details only lasts so long.
